attributes.action: Force the FA to bring in action replay cameras to stop the bad referring ruining the game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After watching Howrads Webb decide that he would help UTD yesterday by giving them a penalty that was clearly not I have decided it is time for us to try and do somthing about all this corruption and cheating that goes off. 

Aston Villa, Blackburn (twice), Spurs, West Brom and Bolton are just a few of the teams who have been ripped off whilst playing UTD this season alone. Would the table be as it is if it wasn't for these rediculously biased decisions? It wouldn't happen in Spain as a bad decisions results in a few games suspended

It is time action replay cameras where used so the league table is decided on football and merit not these so called professional referees who runin games week in week out. 

Please sign this petition

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
